Class Stacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • Stacker

  •  class Stacker
extends java.lang.Object
    The stacker class allows the robot to operate the stacking mechanism. The greenZone method is called by Swagbot when the robot is in the green zone and allows the robot to stack the blocks.
    Author:
    Xavier,Neil

      • greenZone

        public void greenZone()
        Stacks the blocks the robot is holding. Print statments are included for debugging as well as unexpected behavior with the rotateTo method turning past the given angle. There was believed that the print statments might stop the problem. Whether this work or not is unknown. We added them last minute.
